junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Yes, Hansel worked very well for us at the i=
ndividual test
> level, within Eclipse.  The major drawback that we had was=

> that the results were included with the actual test results.
> So, when =
we looked at our overall test results (from our
> nightlybuild) it was diff=
icult to easily see what failures
> were due to code, and which were just d=
ue to lack of coverage
> (had to dig into each package and class).

I'd rat=
her see that as a drawback of not running the tests often enough, but
that =
might just be me... ;)

Cheers, Ilja
